mini_game.Sprite

Uses of Sprite in mini_game
 

Methods in mini_game that return types with arguments of type Sprite
 java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Sprite> MiniGame.getGUIButtons()
          For accessing the game GUI buttons.
 java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Sprite> MiniGame.getGUIDecor()
          For accessing the game GUI decor.
 

Methods in mini_game with parameters of type Sprite
 boolean Sprite.aabbsOverlap(Sprite testSprite)
          This method tests to see if the the testSprite's AABB overlaps this Sprite's AABB.
 float Sprite.calculateDistanceToSprite(Sprite targetSprite)
          This method calculates and returns the real number distance from this sprite to the targetSprite using the top-left corner of their AABBs as points.
